question.questionA: Leaves  25-60 mm,  ovate,  entire,  with  translucent  glands,  smelling strongly of goats; flowers 3 cm across; sepals lanceolate, caducous in fruit.
question.questionB: Leaves 10-20 mm, ovate, crenate, with yellowish glandular vesicles on the margins; flowers 2-3 cm across; sepals ovate, persistent in fruit.
Plants more or less glabrous, erect.

question.questionA: Leaves  amplexicaul,  without  translucent glands; margins of sepals densely coated with dark, stalked glands.
question.questionB: Leaves  lanceolate,  with  translucent glands; margins of sepals eglandular.
